Articles.Content:
Aeris VTOL

Easy to fly and stable aircraft.

Remember to turn on SAS, RCS and precise control!

You need B9 aerospace mod.

Keys:

[1] - raise vtol engine

[2] - lower engine

[3] - normal fligt/vtol

Album - http://bit.ly/14gnuzy

Craft file - http://bit.ly/aerisvtol

I just made a plane with these votl, they are pretty bugged though.

When you start they just start up in a 90 degree angle and they also do not respond to the correct commands.
